title: 目前國際社會就武漢肺炎對中國的旅遊警示

replies.msg:
美國：切勿前往湖北省（最高級別，因為肺炎），其他省份提高警覺（因中國的任意執法）

China - Level 2: Exercise Increased Caution
OH
Level 4: Do not travel to Hubei province, China due to novel coronavirus first identified in Wuhan, China:

There is an ongoing outbreak of pneumonia first identified in Wuhan, China, caused by a novel (new) coronavirus. In an effort to contain the novel coronavirus, the Chinese authorities have suspended air and rail travel in the area around Wuhan. On January 23, 2020, the Department of State ordered the departure of all non-emergency U.S. personnel and their family members. The U.S. government has limited ability to provide emergency services to U.S. citizens in Hubei province.


澳洲：正常旅遊（整個中國），湖北省，切勿前往（因為肺炎）。

China Overall: Exercise normal safety precautions

We have raised the travel advice for all Australians to do not travel to all of Hubei Province. The Chinese authorities have put new measures in place to contain the spread of the coronavirus. Strict travel restrictions have been imposed in Wuhan and a number of other cities in Hubei Province. Authorities could impose further restrictions across Hubei Province with little notice

加拿大
中國：高度警覺（理由是警方任意執法），湖北（切勿前往，因為新型肺炎）
China - Exercise a high degree of caution
Exercise a high degree of caution in China due to the risk of arbitrary enforcement of local laws.

Hubei Province - Avoid non-essential travel
Avoid non-essential travel to the province of Hubei, including the cities of Wuhan, Huanggang and Ezhou, due to the imposition of heavy travel restrictions in order to limit the spread of a novel coronavirus.

【緊急狀態令】重大宣布：全體連登網民正式接管香港權力，全力領導香港對抗中國肺炎

鑑於中國肺炎疫症嚴峻，港共政府倒行逆施，徹底失去民意信任，已經無力領導現今疫症。
加上此疫症已經在香港鄰近地區面臨失控下，有機會令香港國家陷入危機，影響香港國家存亡。

為防止中國肺炎在香港大規模爆發，在此宣佈，於香港時間2020年1月26日21時30分正式頒布緊急狀態令
為免錯過對抗中國肺炎黃金機會，全體連登網民會即時接管香港權力，全力帶領香港國民對抗中國肺炎，以 香港國民福祉為依歸。
請各位緊記，香港國家一切權力屬於人民，港共政權並非必然行使權力者。

所有重大事件及決策，將會於連登討論區「政事台」討論及表決
議案帖文將會以【議案】為首以作識別

大多數民意支持，以及正評數量淨值為1000或以上， 該議案會被視作「獲得通過」

正式實現全民參政，全民議政
議案通過後，將運用全體公民力量及權力，以及民間一切可能的方法實行各種政策 。
請各位再次緊記，港共政權並非必然行使權力者，權力永遠歸於所有香港國民。

【緊急狀態令】重大宣布：全體連登網民正式接管香港權力，全力領導香港對抗中國肺炎
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/1844124

關於香港的國際旅遊警示

加拿大：高度警戒，理由係大型示威。沒有提及肺炎事件。
Exercise a high degree of caution in Hong Kong due to ongoing large-scale demonstrations.

Health risk : no advise

美國：提高警覺，因為發生內亂，沒有提及肺炎。
Exercise increased caution in Hong Kong due to civil unrest.

澳洲：高度警戒。有提及肺炎。
There is an ongoing outbreak of coronavirus in China, originating from Wuhan City in Hubei Province. Travel advice for China has been updated:
The Hong Kong Government has activated its Emergency Response Level in relation to the coronavirus. Passengers arriving into Hong Kong may undergo temperature screening at all border control points. If you have symptoms, you may be taken to hospital for further testing. If authorities suspect you're infected, you may need to stay in hospital or be quarantined. Talk to your doctor before travelling

We haven’t changed our advice level:
Exercise a high degree of caution in Hong Kong.
